title: I am ping lagging and the ms shower does not display correct ping
body: I am lagging at 200ms constant some games recently the ping has not been displaying correct it says 60ms but you can tell it is spike to 200ms because of the delays that happen and sometimes it spikes long enough to show on the ping display but for some reason recently it has been not showing it on ping display sometimes.  Maybe it is because it is spike for less than a second I don't know.

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be experiencing packet loss or extreme packet buffering. When either of those happens, it can cause you "rubber-banding" or situations where there are delays in actions taking place and suddenly your game visually fast-forward to catch up. Most of the time the cause of these two issues lies in the route to the game server, however, the connection guide that *CrazFight* linked is a good place to start. 

If you still have issues after working through the steps in that guide, please let me know.

Please follow the steps (if there are any you haven't completed) on the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure your connection is set up properly.

If those steps don't help, you can view your connection by running a traceroute, and sharing the results might show us where it's going wrong. I suggest downloading the[ WinMTR Network Diagnostic Tool](http://winmtr.net/download-winmtr/), then use that to run a traceroute to the following IP (allow this to run for 5-15 minutes);

104.160.131.1

Export the results to a text file and paste them here if you'd like us to help, or submit them in a [Support Ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
